title: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
description: Advanced machine learning platform for real-time data analytics and predictive modeling
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive AI-driven analytics platform that processes millions of data points in real-time. The system uses advanced machine learning algorithms to provide predictive insights and automated anomaly detection for enterprise clients.
impact: Reduced data processing time by 85% and improved prediction accuracy by 40%

title: Quantum Circuit Simulator
description: Interactive quantum computing simulator with real-time circuit building and measurement visualization
longDescription: Built a comprehensive quantum circuit simulator that allows users to design, build, and simulate quantum circuits with real-time visualization. Features include drag-and-drop gate placement, multiple simulation modes (exact and sampling), and educational examples like Bell states and GHZ states. The simulator uses advanced mathematical libraries for accurate quantum state calculations and provides detailed measurement statistics.
impact: Educational tool for quantum computing concepts with interactive circuit design

title: Blockchain Trading Bot
description: Automated cryptocurrency trading system with AI-driven market analysis
longDescription: Developed an intelligent trading bot that analyzes market trends using deep learning models. The system can execute trades based on technical indicators and sentiment analysis of social media data.
impact: Achieved 23% average monthly returns with 89% accuracy

title: Neural Network Visualizer
description: Interactive tool for visualizing and understanding deep learning architectures
longDescription: Created an educational platform that helps students and professionals understand neural network architectures through interactive 3D visualizations. Users can build networks and see how data flows through them.

title: AI-Powered Code Assistant
description: Real-time code completion and explanation using transformer models
longDescription: An in-browser IDE-like environment powered by Monaco Editor with live AI code completion. Users can choose between multiple transformer models (Codex, GPT-J, CodeGen), view completion statistics, and receive natural-language explanations for their code.
impact: Demonstrates local AI-assisted coding capabilities in the browser
